session_notes.summary: User extremely frustrated after 15x image change requests and 5x navigation requests were ignored. Created CLAUDE.md framework and Oracle state for persistent task tracking. Navigation simplified from 9→5 items, all HTML pages updated. User works unpaid on Unidos, time is valuable.

Major website enhancement session: (1) Implemented complete 6-language i18n system with translation engine, language switcher, and reference implementation. (2) Redesigned navigation with mega dropdown showing initiatives (REGESOIL, Women's Circle) with 40% more spacious layout. (3) Created comprehensive landing pages for both initiatives with impact stats, leadership profiles, program showcases. (4) Updated images to vermicomposting.jpg for better regenerative agriculture representation. (5) Created parallel development plan for 3-4 developers to apply i18n to all 11+ pages. Status: Core system complete, needs team to apply to all pages.

Compliance & Security work: (1) Drafted comprehensive 50+ page GDPR compliance plan for refugee data handling covering UNHCR guidelines, consent management (6 languages), data subject rights, breach protocols, and 4-phase implementation roadmap. (2) Completed comprehensive Bonzi_v5 security audit (528 lines) consolidating all historical vulnerability remediation (Sept 2025, Jan 2025), verifying SQL injection protection, reviewing admin/session systems, confirming OWASP Top 10 compliance (9/10). Key finding: ALL critical vulnerabilities resolved, system production-ready with LOW risk. Committed to Bonzi_v5 repo.
